quote: I'm not the kind of person who tries to be cool or trendy, I'm definitely an individual.

name: Vanessa Hudgens

quote: I don't think of myself as hot or cool or anything, just a dork.

quote: I think it's cool to be smart, and I think it's sexy to be smart.

quote: It's cool to be different and just be who you are and shock people in a good way.

quote: I could never dream of being cool.
name: Andrea Corr

quote: Every collection that I work on, I always think, Is this cool enough to wear to a concert?
name: Anna Sui

quote: I'm involved in so many cool and interesting and redeeming things. I'm enjoying every day.
name: Chris Borland

quote: I have, I admit, a low tolerance for detached chronicling and cool analysis.
name: Leslie Fiedler

quote: It's cool to have a well run, comfortable and inviting home.
name: Anthea Turner

quote: Apparently it's cool to watch The Daily Show.
name: Rob Corddry

quote: I think you create your own hipness.
name: Peabo Bryson

quote: Spiderman can climb walls and he's got a cool outfit.
name: Rhona Mitra
